review_title: Supportive HR Team, great working experience
job_title: Senior Human Resources Business Partner in Hong Kong
pros:
Really flexible/ good work life balance.
Good benefits
The HR team I worked in had a fantastic leader who was supportive but let us get on with our role. I really enjoyed my time at the uni.
Development opportunities.
cons:
Processes are outdated.
Slow to change/make progress
Its a big shift in culture coming from a corporate environment and it won't be for everyone but if you are in a good team the pros outweigh the cons.
- a little expensive but definitely worth it, the best uni in Aus hands down
